title: Halo
description: I fell in love with Thomas Wells and knew he was my forever. I was sixteen when I gave him my heart. Our love was the kind to last a lifetime. But Thomas was broken. The first day we met he told me he was going to become a Navy SEAL. At nineteen he enlisted. At twenty he married me.At twenty five he left me pregnant and didn't turn back. I knew he was suffering…. I also knew I couldn't save him. He left me broken.I was scared and alone. Until I met Ryder St. John a wounded soldier… He was lost. I was lost. Together we made sense.  I fell in love again… What Ryder forgot to mention was that he held a secret so explosive that it could shatter both our worlds.
author: R.C. Stephens
